detail_desc: Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Waist belt in imitation suede with elastication at the back and an adjustable metal buckle fastening. Width 5 cm.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
V-neck body in a modal and silk blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lined gusset with concealed press-studs, and medium coverage at the back.

Quilted, lightweight jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11.5x24 cm.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a high collar, large buttons over the shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The jumper can also be worn as a gilet by unbuttoning the sleeves.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Terry linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with quilted details, zips in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Studio Collection. Boxy-style slipover in a chunky-knit cotton blend with a deep V-neck, large, loose sequins covering the front and back, and wide ribbing around the neckline and hem. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Sock-style court shoes in imitation leather with a jersey top section, pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Lace body with a deep V-neck, short cap sleeves, a seam at the hips and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Block-patterned T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Hat in braided paper straw with a cotton band and ties. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Short, pattern-weave skirt with a high waist, detachable belt, concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover. Lined.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.

Running jacket in textured, fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and long sleeves with thumbholes and tape-trimmed cuffs. Gently rounded at the back.
Platform Derby shoes with lacing at the top and contrasting colour stitching around the soles. Linings and insoles in recycled polyester, and fluted soles. Platform 4.5 cm.

V-neck playsuit in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. Opening with ties at the back of the neck, flutter sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets. Short, wide legs. Lined at the top.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Sleeveless blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with a textured pattern. Collar, buttons down the front, hemstitched insets and sewn-in pin-tucks at the front and a small frill trim around the armholes.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Double-layered hats in cotton jersey. One patterned.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey.

Sleeveless romper suit in patterned slub cotton jersey with a double-layered top. Elastication and narrow shoulder straps with sewn-on bows at the top, press-studs at the crotch and short legs with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the hems.
Short dress in imitation leather with a round neckline, covered press-studs down the front, short, wide sleeves and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Joggers in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Nursing jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a round neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. High slits in the sides for easier nursing access.
Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front and a jersey-lined, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, wrapover skirt in a crêpe weave with a wide grosgrain waistband and a metal buckle at one side. Unlined.
Sports socks in a cotton blend.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a wider neckline and flounce at the top and over the shoulders. Concealed elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with frayed, raw-edge hems.
Dress in metallic-coated jersey with draping and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Short, flared skirt in woven fabric with a regular waist and concealed zip at the back. Discreet side pockets and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with an extra-high waist. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Dress in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The dress is fitted, knee-length and has 3/4-length sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems. Coin pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-cut dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neck, pockets in the side seams and a gentle flare to the hem. Lined at the top.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with gathered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports set with a sports top and pair of sports shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Long cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Fitted top in jersey with an asymmetric neckline and long sleeves.
Set with earrings and ear cuffs in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads and glass rhinestones. Four ear cuffs and eight earrings in various designs.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.

Bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Calf-length dress in a woven wool blend with a round neckline and concealed zip at the front. Double-layered yoke with a gathered seam at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip in one side and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.
Trenchcoat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a hook-and-eye fastening at the top and a loose yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets, and a single back vent. Lined.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hems, and press-stud fastenings.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill around the neckline that continues over the shoulder straps, and a decorative bow at the back. Lined gusset.
Jumper in a soft pointelle knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. No buttons. Lined.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Opening at the front with lace at the bottom, an open back section in lace with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, and a gathered seam at the waist. Lined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and deep, raw-edge armholes.
Jacket in soft pile with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck with a lace section at the front, low-cut back and long sleeves. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Embossed metal earrings with a round disc at the top and a large rectangular pendant. Diameter approx. 6.3 cm.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, pleats at the top to create soft draping and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Cotton slippers with elastication around the opening, terry linings and insoles and soft, imitation suede soles.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, straight-cut jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front and wide, covered elastication at the back, and diagonal side pockets.
Dress in a patterned cotton weave with a round neckline and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with narrow elastication, and gathered tiers to the hem.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.

Dungarees in washed cotton denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable straps with fasteners at the front, press-studs at the sides, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Padded ski mittens in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with elastication and a hook and loop fastener at the top. Reflective details and a Thinsulate™ lining.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
